metadata.title: CVE-2019-0160 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in system firmware for EDK II may allow unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via network access.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1').
